thumb.name: Thanksgiving Blessings
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EFor You. Heather%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Ci%3E'Bless friends%3Cbr%3Eand loved ones.%3Cbr%3Enear and far.%3Cbr%3Ewith all%3Cbr%3Ethe nicest things%3Cbr%3Ethere are.'%3C/i%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy Thanksgiving %26#151;%3Cbr%3Eand%3Cbr%3EGod bless you%3Cbr%3Ealways!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Beautiful Day
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHappy%3Cbr%3EThanksgiving.%3Cbr%3EJulie%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EThinking of you at Thanksgiving%3Cbr%3EIn a warm and affectionate way.%3Cbr%3EAnd wishing you all the blessings%3Cbr%3EOf a beautiful. bountiful day!%3Cbr%3E
